name: BOOt Em Out
description:
Even ghosts need a place to stay. Haunt and scare off potential buyers looking to stay in YOUR new home! Not everyone shares the same fears. Possess toys and knock over props to spook the people, see what it that makes their skin crawl. Do a lousy job at creeping and they'll evict you themselves!

By Kaley Blackwell, Marco Cortes (MICA Game Lab Global Game Jam 2021)

Music by Joel Cummins
